articles.title: Meteor shower will illuminate the night sky on New Year's weekend - Daily Mail
articles.description: The annual meteor shower runs every year between December 28 and January 12, but in 2021 the best views in the UK will be after dark on January 2 and 3.
articles.content:
Stargazers will be able to catch a glimpse of the Quadrantid meteor shower this weekend, which illuminates the sky with up to 200 shooting stars every hour.
